Package org.maxicp.state.datastructures

Class StateSequenceSet

java.lang.Object
org.maxicp.state.datastructures.StateSequenceSet
public class StateSequenceSet extends Object
Sequence set implemented using a sparse-set data structure that can be saved and restored through the StateManager.saveState() / StateManager.restoreState() methods. The sequence is split into three sets: required values, possible values and excluded values

  • Constructor Details

    • StateSequenceSet

      public StateSequenceSet(StateManager sm, int n)
      create a sequence set with the elements {R : {}, P: {0,...,n-1}, E: {}}
      Parameters:
      sm - the state manager that will save and restore the set when StateManager.saveState() / StateManager.restoreState() methods are called
      n - number of elements within the set

    • StateSequenceSet

      public StateSequenceSet(StateManager sm, int minInclusive, int maxInclusive)
      create a sequence set with the elements {R : {}, P: {min,...,max}, E: {}}
      Parameters:
      sm - the state manager that will save and restore the set when StateManager.saveState() / StateManager.restoreState() methods are called
      minInclusive - minimum value of the domain
      maxInclusive - maximum value of the domain with maxInclusive >= minInclusive

    • StateSequenceSet

      public StateSequenceSet(StateManager sm, Set<Integer> values)
      create a sequence set with the elements {R : {}, P: values, E: {}}
      Parameters:
      sm - the state manager that will save and restore the set when StateManager.saveState() / StateManager.restoreState() methods are called
      values - values to set in the domain

  • Method Details

    • exclude

      public boolean exclude(int val)
      move a value from the set of possible values to the set of excluded values
      Parameters:
      val - value to mark as excluded
      Returns:
      true if the value has been moved from the set of possible to the set of excluded

    • require

      public boolean require(int val)
      move a value from the set of possible values to the set of required values
      Parameters:
      val - value to mark as required
      Returns:
      true if the value has been moved from the set of possible to the set of required

    • requireOne

      public boolean requireOne(int v)
      set one value as the required value and move all other values into the exclusion set
      Parameters:
      v - unique value that will be set as required
      Returns:
      true if the set of required was empty and the value has been marked as required

    • excludeAllPossible

      public boolean excludeAllPossible()
      move all possible values into the set of excluded values
      Returns:
      true if the set of possible values has been reduced

      val - value to train1
